00048 void free_property(bProperty *prop)
00049 {
00050     
00051     if (prop->poin && prop->poin != &prop->data) MEM_freeN(prop->poin);
00052     MEM_freeN(prop);
00053     
00054 }
00055 
00056 void free_properties(ListBase *lb)
00057 {
00058     bProperty *prop;
00059     
00060     while ( (prop= lb->first) ) {
00061         BLI_remlink(lb, prop);
00062         free_property(prop);
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 bProperty *copy_property(bProperty *prop)
00067 {
00068     bProperty *propn;
00069     
00070     propn= MEM_dupallocN(prop);
00071     if (prop->poin && prop->poin != &prop->data) {
00072         propn->poin= MEM_dupallocN(prop->poin);
00073     }
00074     else propn->poin= &propn->data;
00075     
00076     return propn;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void copy_properties(ListBase *lbn, ListBase *lbo)
00080 {
00081     bProperty *prop, *propn;
00082     free_properties(lbn); /* in case we are copying to an object with props */
00083     prop= lbo->first;
00084     while (prop) {
00085         propn= copy_property(prop);
00086         BLI_addtail(lbn, propn);
00087         prop= prop->next;
00088     }
00089     
00090     
00091 }
00092 
00093 void init_property(bProperty *prop)
00094 {
00095     /* also use when property changes type */
00096     
00097     if (prop->poin && prop->poin != &prop->data) MEM_freeN(prop->poin);
00098     prop->poin= NULL;
00099     
00100     prop->data= 0;
00101     
00102     switch(prop->type) {
00103     case GPROP_BOOL:
00104     case GPROP_INT:
00105     case GPROP_FLOAT:
00106     case GPROP_TIME:
00107         prop->poin= &prop->data;
00108         break;
00109     case GPROP_STRING:
00110         prop->poin= MEM_callocN(MAX_PROPSTRING, "property string");
00111         break;
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 bProperty *new_property(int type)
00117 {
00118     bProperty *prop;
00119 
00120     prop= MEM_callocN(sizeof(bProperty), "property");
00121     prop->type= type;
00122 
00123     init_property(prop);
00124     
00125     strcpy(prop->name, "prop");
00126 
00127     return prop;
00128 }

00130 /* used by unique_property() only */
00131 static bProperty *get_property__internal(bProperty *first, bProperty *self, const char *name)
00132 {
00133     bProperty *p;
00134     for (p= first; p; p= p->next) {
00135         if (p!=self && (strcmp(p->name, name)==0))
00136             return p;
00137     }
00138     return NULL;
00139 }
00140 void unique_property(bProperty *first, bProperty *prop, int force)
00141 {
00142     bProperty *p;
00143 
00144     /* set the first if its not set */
00145     if (first==NULL) {
00146         first= prop;
00147         while (first->prev) {
00148             first= first->prev;
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00152     if (force) {
00153         /* change other names to make them unique */
00154         while ((p = get_property__internal(first, prop, prop->name))) {
00155             unique_property(first, p, 0);
00156         }
00157     }
00158     else {
00159         /* change our own name until its unique */
00160         if (get_property__internal(first, prop, prop->name)) {
00161             /* there is a collision */
00162             char new_name[sizeof(prop->name)];
00163             char base_name[sizeof(prop->name)];
00164             char num[sizeof(prop->name)];
00165             int i= 0;
00166 
00167             /* strip numbers */
00168             BLI_strncpy(base_name, prop->name, sizeof(base_name));
00169             for (i= strlen(base_name)-1; (i>=0 && isdigit(base_name[i])); i--) {
00170                 base_name[i]= '\0';
00171             }
00172             i= 0;
00173 
00174             do { /* ensure we have enough chars for the new number in the name */
00175                 BLI_snprintf(num, sizeof(num), "%d", i++);
00176                 BLI_strncpy(new_name, base_name, sizeof(prop->name) - strlen(num));
00177                 strcat(new_name, num);
00178             } while (get_property__internal(first, prop, new_name));
00179 
00180             BLI_strncpy(prop->name, new_name, sizeof(prop->name));
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }

00185 bProperty *get_ob_property(Object *ob, const char *name)
00186 {
00187     return BLI_findstring(&ob->prop, name, offsetof(bProperty, name));
00188 }
00189 
00190 void set_ob_property(Object *ob, bProperty *propc)
00191 {
00192     bProperty *prop;
00193     prop= get_ob_property(ob, propc->name);
00194     if (prop) {
00195         free_property(prop);
00196         BLI_remlink(&ob->prop, prop);
00197     }
00198     BLI_addtail(&ob->prop, copy_property(propc));
00199 }

00201 /* negative: prop is smaller
00202  * positive: prop is larger
00203  */
00204 int compare_property(bProperty *prop, const char *str)
00205 {
00206 //  extern int Gdfra;       /* sector.c */
00207     float fvalue, ftest;
00208     
00209     switch(prop->type) {
00210     case GPROP_BOOL:
00211         if (BLI_strcasecmp(str, "true")==0) {
00212             if (prop->data==1) return 0;
00213             else return 1;
00214         }
00215         else if (BLI_strcasecmp(str, "false")==0) {
00216             if (prop->data==0) return 0;
00217             else return 1;
00218         }
00219         /* no break, do GPROP_int too! */
00220         
00221     case GPROP_INT:
00222         return prop->data - atoi(str);
00223 
00224     case GPROP_FLOAT:
00225     case GPROP_TIME:
00226         // WARNING: untested for GPROP_TIME
00227         // function isn't used currently
00228         fvalue= *((float *)&prop->data);
00229         ftest= (float)atof(str);
00230         if ( fvalue > ftest) return 1;
00231         else if ( fvalue < ftest) return -1;
00232         return 0;
00233 
00234     case GPROP_STRING:
00235         return strcmp(prop->poin, str);
00236     }
00237     
00238     return 0;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void set_property(bProperty *prop, const char *str)
00242 {
00243 //  extern int Gdfra;       /* sector.c */
00244 
00245     switch(prop->type) {
00246     case GPROP_BOOL:
00247         if (BLI_strcasecmp(str, "true")==0) prop->data= 1;
00248         else if (BLI_strcasecmp(str, "false")==0) prop->data= 0;
00249         else prop->data= (atoi(str)!=0);
00250         break;
00251     case GPROP_INT:
00252         prop->data= atoi(str);
00253         break;
00254     case GPROP_FLOAT:
00255     case GPROP_TIME:
00256         *((float *)&prop->data)= (float)atof(str);
00257         break;
00258     case GPROP_STRING:
00259         strcpy(prop->poin, str); /* TODO - check size? */
00260         break;
00261     }
00262     
00263 }
00264 
00265 void add_property(bProperty *prop, const char *str)
00266 {
00267 //  extern int Gdfra;       /* sector.c */
00268 
00269     switch(prop->type) {
00270     case GPROP_BOOL:
00271     case GPROP_INT:
00272         prop->data+= atoi(str);
00273         break;
00274     case GPROP_FLOAT:
00275     case GPROP_TIME:
00276         *((float *)&prop->data)+= (float)atof(str);
00277         break;
00278     case GPROP_STRING:
00279         /* strcpy(prop->poin, str); */
00280         break;
00281     }
00282 }

00284 /* reads value of property, sets it in chars in str */
00285 void set_property_valstr(bProperty *prop, char *str)
00286 {
00287 //  extern int Gdfra;       /* sector.c */
00288 
00289     if (str == NULL) return;
00290 
00291     switch(prop->type) {
00292     case GPROP_BOOL:
00293     case GPROP_INT:
00294         sprintf(str, "%d", prop->data);
00295         break;
00296     case GPROP_FLOAT:
00297     case GPROP_TIME:
00298         sprintf(str, "%f", *((float *)&prop->data));
00299         break;
00300     case GPROP_STRING:
00301         BLI_strncpy(str, prop->poin, MAX_PROPSTRING);
00302         break;
00303     }
00304 }
00305 
00306 void cp_property(bProperty *prop1, bProperty *prop2)
00307 {
00308     char str[128];
00309 
00310     set_property_valstr(prop2, str);
00311 
00312     set_property(prop1, str);
00313 }
